GetProduct.Statement: SELECT w2_Product.product_id AS product_id ,w2_Product.product_id AS variation_id FROM w2_Product WHERE w2_Product.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_Product.product_id = @variation_id UNION ( SELECT w2_ProductVariation.product_id AS product_id ,w2_ProductVariation.variation_id AS variation_id FROM w2_ProductVariation WHERE w2_ProductVariation.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_ProductVariation.variation_id = @variation_id )
